TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProfileOptimization extends System.Object
public ref class ProfileOptimization abstract sealed

summary.span: 通过基于以前编译中创建的配置文件，执行可能执行的方法的后台编译，提高了需要实时 (JIT) 编译器的应用程序中应用程序域的启动性能。

span.span: Improves the startup performance of application domains in applications that require the just-in-time (JIT) compiler by performing background compilation of methods that are likely to be executed, based on profiles created during previous compilations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 配置文件优化需要多核计算机。Profile optimization requires a multicore computer. 这些方法在其他计算机上被忽略。The methods are ignored on other computers. 每次在应用程序域中启动配置文件优化时，都将读取在上一个使用过程中创建的配置文件。Each time you initiate profile optimization in an application domain, the profile that was created during the previous use is read. 配置文件中的信息用于通过标识在启动过程中最可能执行的方法来指导后台编译。The information in the profile is used to guide background compilation by identifying the methods that are most likely to be executed during startup. 在多核计算机上，这会增加方法在需要时已编译的机会，使主应用程序线程不必调用 JIT 编译器。On multicore computers, this increases the chances that a method is already compiled by the time it is needed so that the main application thread does not have to call the JIT compiler. 配置文件将在每次使用时被覆盖，因此它始终包含有关启动过程中使用的方法的最新信息。The profile file is overwritten on each use, so it always contains the most recent information about which methods are used during startup. 优化配置文件并不限于应用程序域启动。Optimization profiles are not restricted to application domain startup. 它们可用于需要大量使用 JIT 编译器的任何活动。They can be used for any activity that will require heavy use of the JIT compiler. 您可以为应用程序域维护多个配置文件，以便每个此类活动都有其自己的配置文件。You can maintain multiple profiles for an application domain so that each such activity has its own profile. 若要在应用程序域中使用优化配置文件，必须调用 方法，并指定存储配置文件的文件夹。To use optimization profiles in an application domain, you must call the method and specify the folder where profiles are stored. 此文件夹必须已存在。The folder must already exist. 若要开始使用配置文件，请调用 方法，并指定配置文件的文件名。To begin using a profile, call the method and specify the file name of the profile. 如果先前未记录该文件，则在第一次使用时创建文件。If the file was not recorded previously, it is created on first use. 首次创建配置文件时，不会产生任何性能优势。There is no performance benefit the first time a profile is created. 配置文件优化不会更改执行方法的顺序。Profile optimization does not change the order in which methods are executed. 不会在后台线程上执行方法;如果编译但从不调用方法，则不会使用该方法。Methods are not executed on the background thread; if a method is compiled but never called, it is simply not used. 如果配置文件已损坏或无法写入指定的文件夹（例如，因为文件夹不存在），则程序执行将继续，而不会进行优化分析。If a profile file is corrupt or cannot be written to the specified folder (for example, because the folder does not exist), program execution continues without optimization profiling.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void SetProfileRoot(string directoryPath) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetProfileRoot (directoryPath As String)

param.name: directoryPath
param.span: 指向某个文件夹的完整路径，其中存储了用于当前应用程序域的配置文件。

span.span: The full path to the folder where profile files are stored for the current application domain.

summary.span: 启用当前应用程序域的优化配置，并设置存储优化配置文件的文件夹。

span.span: Enables optimization profiling for the current application domain, and sets the folder where the optimization profile files are stored.

summary.span: 在单核计算机上，此方法被忽略。

span.span: On a single-core computer, the method is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在当前应用程序域中首次调用 方法之前，必须先调用此方法。You must call this method before you call the method for the first time in the current application domain. 如果在同一个应用程序域中多次调用 ，则将忽略第一个的所有调用。If you call more than once in the same application domain, all calls after the first are ignored. 指定的文件夹必须已经存在。The specified folder must already exist. 如果该方法不存在，则调用此方法不会创建它，也不会进行分析。If it does not exist, calling this method does not create it, and no profiling occurs. 在不具有多个内核的计算机上，此方法将被忽略。On computers that do not have multiple cores, this method is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void StartProfile(string profile) cil managed
Public Shared Sub StartProfile (profile As String)

param.name: profile
param.span: 要使用的配置文件的文件名。

span.span: The file name of the profile to use.

summary.span: 启动方法的实时 (JIT) 编译，这些方法记录在后台线程上的指定配置文件中。

span.span: Starts just-in-time (JIT) compilation of the methods that were previously recorded in the specified profile file, on a background thread.

summary.span: 开始记录当前方法的使用，此记录过程之后将覆盖指定的配置文件。

span.span: Starts the process of recording current method use, which later overwrites the specified profile file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的配置文件存在于 方法指定的文件夹中，则使用它所包含的信息来确定在后台线程上编译方法的顺序。If the specified profile exists in the folder specified by the method, the information it contains is used to determine the order in which methods are compiled on the background thread. 如果配置文件尚不存在，则 方法会创建配置文件，并启动方法使用的记录。The method creates the profile if it does not already exist, and initiates the recording of method use. 仅记录实际调用的方法，而不管它们是在后台线程上还是在主应用程序线程上编译的。Only methods that are actually called are recorded, regardless of whether they were compiled on the background thread or on the main application thread. 在主应用程序线程上编译方法，前提是该应用程序需要在后台线程编译它之前调用它。A method is compiled on the main application thread if the application needs to call it before the background thread has compiled it. 执行记录的代码跟踪方法的编译速率，包括在后台线程和主线程上编译的方法。The code that performs the recording tracks the rate at which methods are compiled, including methods that are compiled on both the background thread and on the main thread. 当速率降到预先确定的级别时，记录将停止。When the rate falls below a predetermined level, recording stops. 如果 JIT 编译速率超过预先确定的上限，则记录也会停止。Recording also stops if the rate of JIT compilation exceeds a predetermined upper limit. 调用此方法将停止以前正在进行的任何记录。Calling this method stops any previous recording in progress. 使用空配置文件名称调用此方法会停止正在进行的任何记录，并且不会启动新的记录。Calling this method with a null profile file name stops any recording in progress and does not start a new recording. 如果尚未为当前应用程序域调用 方法，或者如果计算机不具有多个内核，则 方法不起作用。If the method has not been called for the current application domain, or if the computer does not have multiple cores, the method has no effect.
